feed.title: script tests - invalid script in script_valid.json?

entry.title: script tests - invalid script in script_valid.json?
entry.summary: In an email from July 29, 2012, Stefan Thomas expresses his gratitude towards Gavin for adding data-driven test cases. He emphasizes the usefulness of these test cases and mentions that pynode will be making use of them soon. Jeff Garzik responds to this email, with a +1, indicating agreement with Stefan's comments. Jeff also adds that these test cases are a useful cross-platform tool. Jeff Garzik is associated with exMULTI Inc. and can be contacted at jgarzik@exmulti.com.
